name: Ceramic Tapas Plates in Creme and soft colors
description:
Bridges Pottery Tapas Plates
Listing is for One (1) Plate

Beautiful Organic looking hand painted tapas or appetizer plates. Each plate has a pretty pattern on a portion of it and that area is delicately handpainted in a highlighted glaze. They stack nicely but each have theri own identity. Can be used for serving or as a place to leave your valuables on the nightstand. 

Makes a great wedding gift. Special stack of little plates for all sorts of uses.
Measures 5 1/2" in diameter. Food, Dishwasher and Microwave friendly.

Sold  as singles and in multiples. 

Can be custom ordered for special quantities or colors. Just contact me.
_______________________________________

I am dedicated to excellence in craftsmanship and am a practical potter with over three decades of experience.

I make all of my pottery myself. I do not slip cast or mass produce any of my work. All of my pottery is made one by one. It has a long journey from me to you and with good care it will last you a lifetime. I take great pride in making high quality pieces for you and your home.

All of my handmade stoneware pottery is food friendly. It can be put in the microwave, dishwasher (with good judgement) and oven. Never put a cold pot in a hot oven. Simply let it warm up in the oven.

Follow me on my blog for a behind the scenes look at Bridges Pottery and see pieces before they hit the shelves. You can email me anytime with questions and I can accommodate custom orders.

name: Square Plates- Organic Pattern glazed in Cinnamon
description:
This is a stunning set of eight (8) square plates in Cinnamon. They have a very organic looking  pattern made from some hand crocheted lace. They stack nicely, feel nice in the hand.  (Interested on other quantities - just email me)

Perfect for a side dish, appetizers, cheese and crackers........or in your bedroom or bathroom to hold your valuables or bobby pins. Use them together or spread them around.

Measures 6" x 6"x 1/2"

name: Platter/ Sushi Tray
description:
This is a beautiful platter/tray in a fantastic modern pattern. It has beautiful swoopy curves. The pattern on this piece is highlighted with a contrasting glaze in a greenish blue. It can be used to serve food, side dishes, salad, or also used as a decorative piece in your home.

Measures: 9 1/2" across the middle and 14" diagonal from tip to tip and

This piece is made from a large slab of clay . It is imprinted with a texture and then I select a shape for it. A clean foot is added so that it sits well. This is a show stopper piece.
